      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • canPlayHand

      public boolean canPlayHand()
      Checks that with the current hand the player can make a move Checks indistinctly all the possible coordinates within the playable range (also occupied ones) by calling IsPlayable
      Returns:
      true if the player can make a move otherwise false (should skip the turn)

    • getInPlayOrderList

      public ArrayList<GameCard> getInPlayOrderList()
      inOrderPlayList getter, this arraylist is useful for keeping track of the placing order in the gui interface (overlapping corners)
      Returns:
      GameCard arraylist

    • addStartingCard

      public void addStartingCard(StartingCard startingCard)
      Adds the startingCard to the player field
      Parameters:
      startingCard - the startingCard the player chose

    • getHand

      public ArrayList<ResourceCard> getHand()
      Hand getter
      Returns:
      the hand

    • draw

      public void draw(Deck from, int which) throws NullPointerException
      method to draw a card
      Parameters:
      from - which deck (Resource or Gold cards) to draw from
      which - whether to draw from the covered cards in the deck or from the uncovered ones (0 for the covered, 1 for the first uncovered, 2 for the second)
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • Play

      public int Play(Coordinates where, ResourceCard card)
      method to play a card in a position
      Parameters:
      where - the coordinates in which you want to play
      card - the card you want to play
      Returns:
      the number of points that the card has gotten (-1 for unplaced card)

    • getGameCardByEqualCoordinate

      public GameCard getGameCardByEqualCoordinate(Coordinates coordinates)
      Method to get a gamecard by searching its coordinates (no the same object in tha map)
      Parameters:
      coordinates - Coordinates of the searched card
      Returns:
      the searched card or null

    • IsPlayable

      public boolean IsPlayable(Coordinates where, ResourceCard card)
      method to know if a card is playable in the given coordinates
      Parameters:
      where - the coordinates in which you want to play the card
      card - the card you want to play
      Returns:
      true if it's playable, false if it is not
